verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> to <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> I <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> even to <S%H430>God<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice;<s%> and he gave <S%H238>ear<s%> to me.

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H136>Lord:<s%> my <S%H3027>sore<s%> <S%H5064>ran<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H6313>ceased<s%> not: my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to be <S%H5162>comforted.<s%>
I <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and was <S%H1993>troubled:<s%> I <S%H7878>complained,<s%> and my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H5848>overwhelmed.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
You <S%H270>hold<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H8109>waking:<s%> I am so <S%H6470>troubled<s%> that I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
I have <S%H2803>considered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H5769>ancient<s%> times.

I <S%H2142>call<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%> my <S%H5058>song<s%> in the <S%H3915>night:<s%> I <S%H7878>commune<s%> with my own <S%H3824>heart:<s%> and my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> made diligent <S%H2664>search.<s%>
Will the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H2186>cast<s%> off for <S%H5769>ever?<s%> and will he be <S%H7521>favorable<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more?<s%>
Is his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H656>clean<s%> <S%H656>gone<s%> for <S%H5331>ever?<s%> does his <S%H562>promise<s%> <S%H1584>fail<s%> for ever <S%H1755>more?<s%>
Has <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> to be <S%H2589>gracious?<s%> has he in <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H7092>shut<s%> up his tender <S%H7356>mercies?<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is my <S%H2470>infirmity:<s%> but I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>High.<s%>
I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H4611>works<s%> of the <S%H3050>LORD:<s%> surely I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H6382>wonders<s%> of <S%H6924>old.<s%>
I will <S%H1897>meditate<s%> also of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6467>work,<s%> and <S%H7878>talk<s%> of your <S%H5949>doings.<s%>
Your <S%H1870>way,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> is in the <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is so <S%H1419>great<s%> a <S%H410>God<s%> as our <S%H430>God?<s%>
You are the <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6382>wonders:<s%> you have <S%H3045>declared<s%> your <S%H5797>strength<s%> among the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
You have with your <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> you, O <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> you; they were <S%H2342>afraid:<s%> the <S%H8415>depths<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> were <S%H7264>troubled.<s%>

The <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H2229>poured<s%> out <S%H4325>water:<s%> the <S%H7834>skies<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> out a <S%H6963>sound:<s%> your <S%H2687>arrows<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H1980>abroad.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H7482>thunder<s%> was in the <S%H1534>heaven:<s%> the <S%H1300>lightning<s%> <S%H215>lightened<s%> the <S%H8398>world:<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>trembled<s%> and <S%H7493>shook.<s%>
Your <S%H1870>way<s%> is in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and your <S%H7635>path<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and your <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> are not <S%H3045>known.<s%>
You <S%H5148>led<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>
